text: eninum, avarkalil evarkalukku meyyana nanam kotukkappattiruntato avarkal (marravarkalai nokki) ‘‘unkalukku enna ketu? (Ivvaru en kurukirirkal?) Nampikkai kontu narceyalkal ceytavarkalukku (marumaiyil) allah kotukkum kuliyo (itai vita) evvalavo melanatu. Ataip porumaiyalarkalait tavira (marra evarum) ataiya mattarkal'' enru kurinarkal
